For noobs, the install.exe process can be found in Windows Task Manager (press ctrl + alt + del) and look for it in the Processes tab. Then just click on it and click the End now button. For the really lazy ones, just restart the computer :) . The game is completely installed before the first loop so there is no problem if you end the install process, the game works perfectly.
